content.question: Which of the following contexts is most helpful for understanding the development described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Under the task system on plantations, enslaved people were able to maintain some of their cultural practices.
Enslaved people participated in Spanish expansion in the Americas as conquistadores in hopes of gaining their freedom.
Many enslaved people had to learn new specialized trades and worked as painters, carpenters, and tailors in the Americas.
Due to the demand for enslaved labor, many enslaved people were forcibly relocated from the upper South to the lower South.

content.answer: Under the task system on plantations, enslaved people were able to maintain some of their cultural practices.

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
